t_video_discussion_question_3::text_card: If you get a bad answer, feel free to ask again in a new clip, or find someone else.
t_video_discussion_question_3::evaluatio: هل تروي لنا قصتك أهمية المشكل؟
t_video_discussion_question_3::title: ما أهمية الحدث؟
t_video_discussion_question_3::text_card: Talk to different people for each clip to give your story a range of voices. You may want to substitute the name of the issue you are focused on where you see \“the issue.\”

Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template examines the importance of a single event. Discussions work well for introducing events with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
